Name: Escape Game
About the game: In Escape Game you will have to solve the different puzzles hidden in the house to escape! Dozens of puzzles are hidden in the house. You will have to solve them by finding the different elements hidden in the scenery! Can you find all the elements, solve all the puzzles and escape from the house? Features: ■ A unique level! ■ A lot of puzzles to solve! ■ Very relaxing game! ■ Good music!
